info.name: Christmas Theme for Lichess.org
info.description: A set to add some seasonal flavoring to your chess games! This set features a Santa hat king, Ice Queen, Elf Bishops, Reindeer Knights, Christmas Tree Rooks, and Snowmen Pawn, along with two Christmas boards to go along with them.
info.additionalInfo: <b>**The style is global because of validation issues for the domain. This shouldn't really cause any problems, but if you encounter any issues, try editing the domain for which the style applies to en.lichess.org. Just go to "Edit", scroll to the bottom, and change the domain for which the style applies to to "lichess.org".
